name: Enmity
subtitle: Add plugins and themes to Discord!
description: Add plugins and themes to Discord!

apps.name: Enmity
apps.subtitle: Add plugins and themes to Discord!
apps.localizedDescription: Add plugins and themes to Discord!

privacy.name: NSCameraUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: By allowing access to your camera, you can take pictures and others will be able to see you in voice and video calls.

privacy.name: NSContactsUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: We can help you find people you know on Discord. Your contacts will be regularly sent to us so you can connect with friends. You can turn this off any time.

privacy.name: NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: Allow Discord access to your local network to find devices using the same internet connection.

privacy.name: NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: To enable services that require location

privacy.name: NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: To enable services that require location

privacy.name: NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: To enable services that require location

privacy.name: NSMicrophoneUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: By allowing access to your microphone, you'll be able to talk in calls.

privacy.name: NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: By allowing access to your library, you'll be able to download photos and videos.

privacy.name: NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: By allowing us access to your photos, you will be able to upload images as an avatar, server icon, and more, and you can send photos and videos to your friends and communities.
